Articles.Content: Hi! I'm new around here, but i played te game for a nice while and just got the idea to register here and make a company! I hope that we'll have tins of fun and stuff :3
Great! Look forward to your company. Let us know the name of it! Welcome to the forums!
Welcome to the forums! Best of luck on your endeavors with your company. Hopefully we'll be able to see some of your favorite rocket designs there.
